cancelEscrow(uint256).details: Cancel an escrow (only sender can cancel)

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to cancel

claimEscrow(uint256,bytes32).details: Claim an escrow using the secret

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to claim

createEscrow(address,uint256,uint256,byt.details: Create a new escrow with a magic link

params.expirationTime: When the escrow expires (0 for default)
params.secretHash: Hash of the secret that will be used to claim
params.token: The token to escrow (address(0) for ETH)

emergencyRecover(address,uint256).details: Emergency function to recover stuck tokens (only owner)

params.token: The token to recover (address(0) for ETH)

expireEscrow(uint256).details: Expire an escrow and refund to sender (anyone can call after expiration)

params.escrowId: The ID of the escrow to expire

isClaimable(uint256).details: Check if an escrow is claimable

isExpired(uint256).details: Check if an escrow is expired

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
